title: Fps problems
body:
Hey guys,

So, since four days ago, i was getting problems with fps, droping 60 fps to 30 fps.
Then, today, i was trying to find the problem, and what i founded was when i click in a random key of the keyboard, it drops my fps. 
And i think thats the problem, because i spam my SPACE key to play. 

I cant config this, and i don't know if it is because of my Windows or because of Riot system.

Thanks for the help {{champion:412}} {{champion:36}} ^^

replies.body: Ok For those with fps problems that are stuck with high end graphic cards ima be copying and pasting my post so it my help or may not, All I did to fix my fps problem was check a box in the settings of league to close league client during game. Fixed my fps drop completely hope this helps :)

Same here... every time i spam my Space im getting kinda fps drops, even my fps shows still 60...
my setup :
MSI notebook
Microsoft Windows 10 Pro 64-bit 
Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700HQ CPU @ 2.60GHz
RAM 8192 MB @ 1066 MHz
NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960M, 2048 MB DDR5
Game is installed on SSD, 119,24 GB

"fps troubleshooting guide" did not help, my drivers are updated, game is repaired... I can play witcher 3 on pretty high settings without any fps drops, but LoL seem quite too much for my laptop :(

Issues like this are usually caused by a hardware issue or outdated graphics card driver.  I recommend going over the steps in our [FPS Troubleshooting ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684)guide.  If that doesn't resolve your issue, please contact our tech team by submitting a ticket.  Best of luck![](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

I Think i figure it out.
I have a MSI Motherboard and i have the Killer Network, and maybe is that causing the problems.

Thanks for the advice ! ^^
